metadata.synopsis: The 'Wounded Bird' that Nettie was treating after some time has passed (after Goblin Hunt or Attack on Den). The bird's recovering and feels a bit better.

0.speaker: Wounded Bird
0.text: There was so much noise out there. I'm glad you're okay.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The other blue jay have the exact same line

1.speaker: Wounded Bird
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The other blue jay have the exact same line

2.speaker: Wounded Bird
2.text: Wing's still a little stiff, but I'm getting stronger!
